title: ponnaDi malariNai
sahitya:
ponnaDi malariNai eNNi eNNiyE sanmayamAnEnE nAnE un


anupallavi

  kaNNan enrum maNivaNNan enrum rAdhai mannan unai endan manadil vaittEn dinam


caraNam    maNDalam mIdinil mAdhavanAgi ninrAi toNDar manadil iDam koNDAi enrO inda
maNNaiyum viNNaiyum viyappuravE aLandAi aNDa carAcaram anaittum nirainda
